2.7.8: ✨ **New Feature (Core): MR Fill** - A new automation to automatically fill Muster Rolls. It intelligently marks holidays as absent and includes a manual mode for custom attendance.
✨ **New Feature (Reports): MR Tracking** - Track Muster Roll status in real-time. Includes options to export reports to PDF, Excel, and PNG, plus a workcode extractor.
✨ **New Feature (Reports): Dashboard Report** - A new tool to fetch and view dashboard reports, with full export capabilities (PDF, Excel, PNG) and a workcode extractor.
✨ **New Feature (UI): Sound Effects** - Added audible sound effects for key actions (e.g., automation complete, error). This can be toggled on/off in the settings.
🚀 **Enhancement (Workflow):** A new workflow allows you to send workcodes directly from the **MR Tracking** report to the **eMB Entry** and **MSR Processor** tabs.
🚀 **Enhancement (Workflow):** Send workcodes and panchayat names directly from the **Dashboard Report** to the **MR Fill** automation.
🚀 **Enhancement (Demand):** Demand Automation now automatically adjusts for laborers with 100 mandays and fully supports **GP logins**.
🚀 **Enhancement (Wagelist):** The Wagelist Automation tab now includes an option to **save the generated wagelist as a PDF** document.
🐞 **Bug Fix (ABPS Verify):** Resolved a critical bug where the automation failed to verify multiple laborers registered under the same job card.
